welcome.title: Accessible mental health content in times of emergency
welcome.subtitle1: The purpose of the website is to make available all the important information that has been circling around in recent days about psychological coping in light of the unusual situation we are facing, in a friendly and orderly manner.  There are two ways you can use our database:
welcome.list1: 1. Enter each of the given topics and look at the content that appears in them in a concentrated way.
welcome.list2: 2. Use our "personalisation" function, and by selecting the tags relevant to you, gather all the desired information in a personalized way.
welcome.subtitle2: You are welcome to try the personalisation process through the button below, or enter the recommended topics shown on this page

wizard.no_tags: Must choose at least one tag
wizard.no_orgs: Must choose at least one organization
wizard.no_langs: Must choose at least one language

mistake.name: Full name (not required)
mistake.greeting: If you found a mistake in the content of the site, please fill out the form below. Thank you for your help!

register.name: Name
register.title1: אנו מחפשים אנשי טיפול אשר מעוניינים לאפשר שיחה אחת, חינמית, דרך הזום, למי שצריכה, כדי להקשיב, לתת מקום ואולי קצת כלים שיעזרו בהתמודדות המורכבת.
register.title2: הפרטים שלך יישארו חסויים במערכת וישמשו על מנת שניצור איתך קשר
